title: 黑月夜精灵
prompt: A young woman taking a mirror selfie, face hidden by phone, slim waist, long legs, mysterious aura. Outfit: black silk short camisole with thin straps and subtle sheen, high-waist dark green tight leggings, black patent leather pointed stiletto heels (9cm). Style: pure desire and mysterious, minimal background, soft light highlighting waist and leg curves.
